short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Kos or all similar words on the webpage with "Kos, or some say, Kosm".

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Kos or all similar words on the webpage with "Kos, or some say, Kosm". This is a sentence often said by the Micolash character in the game Bloodborne.
